typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		PaymentNr as string,
		SalesOrderNr as string,
		CustomerNr as string,
		CustomerName as string,
		PaymentDate as date 'dd/MM/yyyy',
		Value as double '000,000,000.000'
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> PaymentsAzDL
source(output(
		CustomerName as string,
		CustomerNr as string,
		PaymentDate as string,
		PaymentNr as string,
		SalesOrderNr as string,
		Value as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'document') ~> PaymentsCosmosDB
PaymentsAzDL sink(input(
		PaymentNr as string,
		SalesOrderNr as string,
		CustomerNr as string,
		CustomerName as string,
		PaymentDate as date,
		PaymentValue as decimal(18,0)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SynapePayments
